column4: anyone have any idea why when i did an upgrade from feisty to gutsy i get a segmentation fault when i try to use wine? I tried to reinstall wine and reinstall my nvidia drivers and I still get the same thing. It worked fine until I upgraded to gutsy.
did you add the wine gutsy repository?
did it upgrade wine to the gutsy version?
i'm not too sure i get a seg fault when i try wine ver
followed by sudo apt-get upgrade wine
any error messages from the upgrade?
i'll just compile it from source i guess :)
i'll just try compiling it from source
